tit.j: キザクラカッパカントリー

sen.j: キザクラカッパカントリー は京都府京都市伏見区にある黄桜のテーマパーク。
sen.e: Kizakura Kappa Country is a thematic park of Kizakura Co., Ltd., located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: キザクラカッパカントリー→Kizakura Kappa Country [http://www.kizakura.co.jp/ja/chokusei/country/]
sen.e: Kizakura Kappa Country is a theme park owned by Kizakura Co., Ltd. located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: ・「thematic」→「theme」・「of」→「owned by」・コンマを１つ削除
sen.e: Kizakura Kappa Country is a theme park owned by Kizakura Co., Ltd. located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 清酒工房や地ビールレストランのほか企業博物館の黄桜記念館が設けられている。
sen.e: The park has a refined sake brewery (Kappa Sake Brewery), a restaurant that serves a local beer, as well as the corporate sake museum (Kappa Gallery).
sen.cmt: 清酒工房→refined sake brewery (Kappa Sake Brewery) としました。 地ビールa local beerとしました。
sen.e: The park has a refined sake brewery (Kappa Sake Brewery), a restaurant that serves local beer, as well as the corporate sake museum (Kappa Gallery).
The park has a refined sake brewery (Kappa Sake Brewery), a restaurant that serves local beer, as well as the corporate sake museum (Kappa Gallery).
It is run by Kizakura Co., Ltd.
It is run by Kizakura Co., Ltd.
It is run by Kizakura Co., Ltd.

sen.cmt: 黄桜酒場→Kappa Tengoku (paradise) （）内を加えました。

sen.j: ギャラリーでは黄桜のCMで使用された清水崑と小島功筆の原画を展示、隣のＣＦライブラリーコーナーでは昭和30年代からの黄桜のCMを観る事ができる。
sen.e: In the gallery, the original drawings used in the Kizakura's commercial massages famous for the unique kappa (water imp) illustrations, which were produced by Kon SHIMIZU with the drawings by Isao KOJIMA, are exhibited, and at the adjacent library corner of commercial films, the visitors can watch the old commercial massages televised since 1955.
sen.cmt: 黄桜のCM→Kizakura's commercial massages famous for the unique kappa (water imp) illustrationsとfamous for the unique kappa (water imp) illustrationsを加えました。
sen.e: The gallery exhibits the original drawings by Kon SHIMIZU and Isao KOJIMA used in Kizakura's advertisements which are famous for the unique kappa (water imp) illustrations, and advertisements shown since 1955 can be watched in the adjacent Commercial Film Library Corner.

The gallery exhibits the original drawings by Kon SHIMIZU and Isao KOJIMA used in Kizakura's advertisements which are famous for the unique kappa (water imp) illustrations, and advertisements shown since 1955 can be watched in the adjacent Commercial Film Library Corner.

sen.j: 「河童資料館」では河童の歴史と各地の伝承を紹介する。
sen.e: Kappa shiryokan' (museum) presents the history of kappa and the local kappa folk stories handed down in various regions.
sen.cmt: 「河童資料館」→定訳不明：'Kappa shiryokan' (museum)としました。
sen.e: The 'Kappa Shiryokan' (museum) presents the history of kappa and the local kappa folk stories handed down in various regions.
The 'Kappa Shiryokan' (museum) presents the history of kappa and the local kappa folk stories handed down in various regions.

sen.j: 清酒工房に通じる展示室では、江戸時代の酒造道具を工程順に展示する。
sen.e: In the exhibit room that leads to Kappa Sake Brewery, brewery tools used during the Edo Period are exhibited following the order of brewing process.
In the exhibit room that leads to the Kappa Sake Brewery, brewery tools used during the Edo Period are exhibited following the order of the brewing process.
In the exhibit room that leads to the Kappa Sake Brewery, brewery tools used during the Edo Period are exhibited following the order of the brewing process.

sen.cmt: ・余計のスペースを削除・「round」を追加

sen.e: 110:00 - 200:00 (the hours vary according to the facility)

sen.j: - 〒612-8046 京都府京都市伏見区塩屋町228番地
sen.e: 228, Shioya-machi, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, 612-8046
228 Shioya-machi, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, 612-8046
sen.cmt: ・余計のスペースを削除・コロンを削除
